mapper.update:
update t_user_role_relation
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

private_menu = #{privateMenu,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.user_id,t1.id,t1.role_id,t2.role_name as roleName,t2.role_desc as roleDesc FROM t_user_role_relation AS t1 LEFT JOIN m_role_info as t2 on t1.role_id=t2.role_id and t2.is_delete = 0 WHERE t1.is_delete = 0 and t1.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_user_role_relation ( id, user_id, role_id, is_delete, create_user, create_time, version ) values
( REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), #{userId}, #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{createUser}, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%m%S'), 0 )
